snippet: The historian Margaret MacMillan finds uneasy parallels between our time and 1914.
abstract: Historian Margaret MacMillan finds uneasy parallels between our time and origins of World War I in book The War That Ended Peace: The Road to 1914; says consequences of war is great, but we still lack understanding of how it started.
lead_paragraph: The historian Margaret MacMillan finds uneasy parallels between our time and 1914.

headline.seo: Margaret MacMillan Discusses Causes of World War I
headline.main: A War Is Long Over, but Many Still Seek to Learn Its Lessons
headline.print_headline: A War Is Long Over, but Many Still Seek to Learn Its Lessons

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The War That Ended Peace: The Road to 1914 (Book)
